select stock_category.id stock_category_id, stock_category.category , stock_kind.id stock_kind_id, stock_kind.kind , stock_part.id stock_part_id, stock_part.part , stock_origin.id stock_origin_id, stock_origin.origin , stock_brand.id stock_brand_id, stock_brand.brand , stock_grade.id stock_grade_id, stock_grade.grade , stock_product.stock_est_id, stock_est.est_no , stock_product.stock_keep_id, stock_keep.keep , MAX(orders_product.prod_date) prod_date from stock_product join stock_category on stock_product.stock_category_id = stock_category.id join stock_kind on stock_product.stock_kind_id = stock_kind.id join stock_part on stock_product.stock_part_id = stock_part.id join stock_origin on stock_product.stock_origin_id = stock_origin.id join stock_brand on stock_product.stock_brand_id = stock_brand.id join stock_grade on stock_product.stock_grade_id = stock_grade.id join stock_est on stock_product.stock_est_id = stock_est.id join stock_keep on stock_product.stock_keep_id = stock_keep.id left join orders_product on orders_product.stock_product_id = stock_product.id where stock_product.id = #{stockProductId} group by stock_product.id

select IF(status='calculate', calculated_kg_price, cont_kg_price) as price , DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') created_at from orders_bid where stock_product_id = #{stockProductId} and status in ('done','calculate') order by id desc

select IFNULL(SUM(IF(orders_bid.status = 'calculate', orders_bid.calculated_tot_weight, orders_bid.cont_tot_weight)), 0) AS total_amount , IFNULL(MAX(IF(orders_bid.status = 'calculate', orders_bid.calculated_kg_price, orders_bid.cont_kg_price)), 0) AS high_price , IFNULL(MIN(IF(orders_bid.status = 'calculate', orders_bid.calculated_kg_price, orders_bid.cont_kg_price)), 0) AS low_price from orders_bid where orders_bid.stock_product_id = #{stockProductId} and orders_bid.status in ('calculate','done')

mapper.select: select nw.name, nw.brand, nw.kuk_nm, nw.est_no , nw.kill_dt, nw.lst_dt, nw.blno, nw.lg_no , nw.mst_key, nw.st_qty, nw.st_kg, nw.unit_kg , stock_warehouse.id stock_warehouse_id, stock_warehouse.name warehouse_name, stock_warehouse.first_address , case when orders_product.status is null or orders_product.status = 'cancel' then 'N' else 'Y' end reg_yn , nw.pmst_seq , DATE_FORMAT(nw.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') created_at from tb_nwill_product_stock as nw join company on nw.comp_reg_num = company.registration_num left join stock_warehouse on nw.scode = stock_warehouse.nw_scode left join orders_product on stock_warehouse.id = orders_product.stock_warehouse_id and nw.mst_key = orders_product.management_num where company.id = #{compId} order by nw.created_at desc, nw.name
